DOC.brief_summary: Obesity directly relate arterial dysfunction negatively associate muscle strength . High-intensity resistance exercise favor modality offset muscle weakness , yet , adverse effect arterial function ( pulse wave velocity , wave reflection , aortic brachial blood pressure ) observe . Conventional unloaded-whole body vibration training ( WBVT ) improve arterial function overweight/obese woman appear low-intensity . Nevertheless , effect moderate-intensity ( add external load ) WBVT arterial muscle function unknown . Therefore , purpose study examine whether loaded-WBVT would induce great benefit unloaded-WBVT arterial muscle function young overweight/obese woman . Furthermore , examine whether change similar healthy lean young woman .
DOC.brief_title: Whole Body Vibration External Load Exercise Training Cardiovascular Autonomic Function Obese Individuals
DOC.detailed_description: The purpose study determine effect 6 week loaded-WBVT arterial stiffness , peripheral aortic blood pressure , wave reflection , endothelial function , muscle strength overweight/obese woman . The specific aim study : 1 . To examine whether 6 week loaded-WBVT beneficial unloaded-WBVT decreasing cardiovascular risk factor assess arterial stiffness ( aortic , leg , systemic ) , aortic blood pressure wave reflection , brachial blood pressure , autonomic function , endothelial function , blood flow ( leg arm ) . 2 . To determine extent 6 week loaded-WBVT improve body composition measure change fat lean mass utilize dual-energy x-ray absorptiometry waist circumference . 3 . To evaluate effect 6 wee loaded-WBVT muscle strength use one-repetition maximum test ( leg press chest press exercise ) .
DOC.criteria: Female 18 25 year age Sedentary ( less 120 min per wk ) 15 lean ( Body mass index 1825 kg/m² ) 45 overweight/obese ( Body mass index 2739.9 kg/m² ) Younger 18 old 25 year age Body mass index lower 18 high 39.9 Physically active competitively active Smokers Pregnant Irregular menstrual cycle Use dietary supplementation ( e.g. , Larginine , Lcitrulline , antioxidant ) Any contraindication exercise and/or wholebody vibration exercise
